scc_goals.description:: Check whether Cloud Object Storage is enabled with customer-managed encryption and Bring Your Own Key (BYOK)
scc_goals.ignore_reason: This module does not create any Cloud object storage and it is used in an example for testing purpose.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Cloud Object Storage network access is restricted to a specific IP range
scc_goals.ignore_reason: This module does not create any Cloud object storage and it is used in an example for testing purpose.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Cloud Object Storage is enabled with customer-managed encryption and Keep Your Own Key (KYOK)
scc_goals.ignore_reason: This module does not create any Cloud object storage and it is used in an example for testing purpose.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Cloud Object Storage buckets are enabled with IBM Activity Tracker
scc_goals.ignore_reason: This module does not create any Cloud object storage bucket and it is used in an example for testing purpose.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Cloud Object Storage buckets are enabled with IBM Cloud Monitoring
scc_goals.ignore_reason: This module does not create any Cloud object storage bucket and it is used in an example for testing purpose.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Cloud Object Storage bucket resiliency is set to cross region
scc_goals.ignore_reason: This module does not create any Cloud object storage bucket and it is used in an example for testing purpose.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) network access control lists don't allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to any port
scc_goals.ignore_reason: False positive introduced in CRA 1.2.1. There is no such allow ingress ACL created by the module. There is a deny rule on 0.0.0.0/0 to any port.

scc_goals.description:: Check whether Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) network access control lists don't allow egress from 0.0.0.0/0 to any port
scc_goals.ignore_reason: False positive introduced in CRA 1.2.1. There is no such allow egress ACL created by the module. There is a deny rule on 0.0.0.0/0 to any port.
